newsitem.title: UK: MAM squeezed higher as markets surge.
newsitem.headline: MAM squeezed higher as markets surge.

text.p: Shares in Mercury Asset Management Plc were squeezed to a record high on Tuesday, reflecting strong markets as the Dow and FTSE 100 reached record levels, dealers said.
MAM shares were quoted up 40-1/2p at 14.47 stg by 0956 GMT in modest volume of 489,226 shares, with dealers saying the price had been marked higher amid a shortage of stock in the market.
"The market is short even at these very high levels, it's getting very difficult to buy stock...especially the fund management stocks," said one dealer.
Among rivals, Schroders Plc was up 12-1/2p at 17.12-1/2 stg, Perpetual Plc was up 72-1/2p at 28.20 stg, M&G Plc was up 42-1/2p at 13.95 stg and Henderson was up 35p at 13.65-1/2.
